name: Gold Miner 2016—Classic Gems Craft Rush & Shape Clicker Games(2 Player + Free)
name_original: Gold Miner 2016—Classic Gems Craft Rush & Shape Clicker Games(2 Player + Free)
description:
Gold Miner HD is one of most popular online casual games. Now it's available on iOS. Hope you will enjoy it!

Gold, diamonds, and dynamite? That's right, you're a gold miner and it's your job to mine as much gold as you can and come out with the most money. Are you ready?

Aim on a gold while the hook swings, and click on the screen to release the hook. Each level has its own random maps. So it won't be the same experience every time you start this game.


FEATURES:
- Addictive gameplay
- 60 unique levels but playing endlessly to get a high score
- Beautiful graphics and a friendly user interface
- Dynamic sound and music
- Load/save game, resume your last play
- Tons of achievements

CONTACT US:
- Visit our official site at http://www.mongko.com
- Send your feedback via hello@mongko.com

The best gold miner for you!
